mapper.select: SELECT u4.url FROM u_user_role u1 LEFT JOIN u_role u2 ON u1.rid = u2.id LEFT JOIN u_role_permission u3 ON u2.id = u3.rid LEFT JOIN u_permission u4 ON u3.pid = u4.id WHERE u1.uid = #{userId};

select count(*) from u_permission
where name like concat("%",#{findContent},"%")
select u1.* from u_permission u1 where exists (select * from u_role_permission u2 where u2.pid =#{id}) and u1.id=#{id}

select count(*) from u_role
where (name like concat("%",#{findContent},"%") or type like concat("%",#{findContent},"%"))

SELECT u2.id ,u2.`name`,u2.type,u4.id as pid,u4.`name` as pname ,u4.url as purl FROM u_user_role u1 LEFT JOIN u_role u2 ON u1.rid = u2.id LEFT JOIN u_role_permission u3 ON u2.id = u3.rid LEFT JOIN u_permission u4 ON u3.pid = u4.id where u1.uid = #{userId}
select u2.pid roleId from u_role u1 left join u_role_permission u2 on u1.id =u2.rid where u1.id=#{id} ;
